overlay.unified: Include all overlays in one single browser source:
overlay.1click_install_tt: This will automatically create and configure the overlay on your current OBS scene
overlay.install_success_exists:
There already was a browser source for this overlay on your scenes.
It has been copied to your current scene.
overlay.install_error:
Something went wrong when installing the overlay:
{ERROR}

connection.title: The overlays need you to {OBS} or {DOCK}
connection.dock_tutorial: On OBS, open Docks => Custom Browser Docks and add Twitchat this way

raffle.title: Animated wheel
raffle.head: Shows an animated wheel when doing a raffle.
raffle.css: You can change the appearance of the wheel by overriding these CSS values on OBS browser source params
raffle.start: To start a raffle, open the commands menu {MENU} or use the {CMD} command.

timer.header: Create timers, control them from Triggers, and display their status on your stream
timer.default_timer: This overlay is tied with {CMD} commands
timer.css: Change the appearance of the timer with these CSS selectors
timer.premium_limit: You reached the maximum number timers you can create.
timer.non_premium_limit:
You reached the maximum number of timers.
Become premium to create up to {MAX} timers.

counters.title: Counters
counters.head: Add any of your counters to your stream by setting hteir URL on a browser source
counters.head_empty: Create counters, update them from chat commands, channel point rewards, sub alerts, etc... and show their progression on your stream.
counters.css: Change counters appearance via those CSS selectors

highlight.title: Message highlight
highlight.instruction: Shows a user's message or a clip on your stream.
highlight.css: You can change the appearance of the message by overriding these CSS IDs on OBS browser source params
highlight.alternative_tool: Check out {URL} for a dedicated tool doing this with much more options

music_common.music: Display currently playing track on your overlay and allow your users to add tracks to the queue or control the playback.
music_common.css: You can change the appearance of the player by overriding these CSS IDs on OBS browser source params
music_common.auto_hide: Keep player visible if nothing is playing
music_common.auto_hide_erase: Erase track infos when nothing is playing
music_common.infos: You can allow your viewers to control playback or add musics to the queue from chat commands thanks to the {TRIGGERS}.

ulule.title: Ulule
ulule.css: You can change the appearance of the progress bar by overriding these CSS IDs on OBS browser source params
ulule.description: Integrate a progress bar for your {LINK} project.
ulule.project_goals_tt: If you have multiple donation tiers, specify them here so the progress doesn't remains filled once the main goal has been reached

credits.title: Ending credits
credits.head: Shows a rolling ending credits.
credits.css: You can change the appearance of the credits by overriding these CSS values on OBS browser source params
credits.param_stickyTitle:
Sticky titles
(current section's title will stick on top of screen)
credits.param_showBadges: Show MOD, VIP and subscriber badges
credits.param_showAllActiveSubs: Show all currently active Twitch subs
credits.param_showAllActiveSubgifters: Show all currently active Twitch subgifters
credits.param_uniqueUsers:
Unique users
(multiple events of the same user are merged into 1)
credits.param_showRewardUsers: Show user list for each reward
credits.premium_category: This category will NOT show up when your stream is live
credits.param_pu_celeb_tt: Won't work until Twitch fixes their API
credits.premium_only: Become Premium to show this section content
credits.manual_install_instructions: Make sure you enable those option on OBS browser source: "Shutdown source when not visible" and "Refresh browser when scene becomes active"

heatDistort.title: OBS source distortion
heatDistort.description: This overlay makes it possible for your viewers to distort your stream rendering by clicking on it.
heatDistort.install: This needs you to {HEAT} on your Twitch channel and {SHADER} plugin on OBS.
heatDistort.install_instructions:
• Set width to twice the viewport size (ex: 3840px for 1920px stream).
  • Set height to viewport's height (ex: 1080px).
  • Hide the source out of screen
  • Set framerate to 60fps
  • Add Shadertastic filter to the parent scene
    • Effect: Displacement map (Source)
    • Displace: mode: Displace + Overlay
    • Color Space: RGB
    • Strength X/Y: 0.050
    • Displacement Map: the browser source you just created
heatDistort.select_target: Select the OBS item you want the effect to be applied to
heatDistort.premium_locked: Disable another distortion or become premium to enable this one
heatDistort.max_reached:
You've reached the maximum distorsion overlay you can create.
Become premium to create up to {COUNT} distortions.
heatDistort.param_triggerOnly_tt:
Enable this if you want to handle clicks yourself from triggers.
Ex: you can allow a user to click for a specific amount of time after a sub, bits, channel points rewards, ...
heatDistort.delete_confirm_desc: If the overlay was installed automatically, the associated filter and browser source will be removed from OBS.
heatDistort.shadertastic_missing:
Shadertastic filter couldn't be created.
Have you installed {URL}?

tts.title: Text to speech
tts.description: Allows you to read messages from an overlay so you can better control audio.

adBreak.title: Ad-break indicator
adBreak.css: You can change the appearance of the elements bar by overriding these CSS IDs on OBS browser source params
adBreak.description:
Show when an ad-break is coming or running.
{DASHBOARD_LINK} must be enabled on your channel.
adBreak.param_showApproaching: Show when an ad is coming
adBreak.param_showRunning: Show when an ad is running

bitswall.title: Bits wall
bitswall.head:
Cheers sent by viewers will fall on your screen.
Viewers can "break" cheers by clicking them with Heat extension.
bitswall.install_instructions:
• Set width to twice the viewport size (ex: 3840px for 1920px stream).
  • Set height to viewport's height (ex: 1080px).
  • Hide the source out of screen
  • Set framerate to 60fps
  • Add Shadertastic filter to the parent scene
    • Effect: Displacement map (Source)
    • Displace: mode: Displace + Overlay
    • Color Space: RGB
    • Strength X/Y: 0.050
    • Displacement Map: the browser source you just created
bitswall.param_size:
Maximum cheermote sizes {VALUE}%
(a pinned cheer drops bigger cheermotes depending on the pin level)
bitswall.param_break: Allow viewers to break cheermotes (Needs Heat extension install on your channel)
bitswall.param_break_senderOnly: Allow viewers to break ONLY their own cheers
bitswall.param_cristalEffect: Enable Cristal effect (Requires Shadertastic OBS plugin)

predictions.title: Predictions
predictions.head: Show current prediction on your stream
predictions.css: You can change the appearance of the prediction by overriding these CSS values on OBS browser source params
predictions.param_listModeOnlyMore2: Only if there are more than 2 outcomes
predictions.param_hideUntilResolved:
Hide once votes are closed
(Prediction will show again once resolved)

polls.title: Polls
polls.head: Show current poll on your stream
polls.css: You can change the appearance of the poll by overriding these CSS values on OBS browser source params
polls.param_listModeOnlyMore2: Only if there are more than 2 choices

chatPoll.title: Chat polls
chatPoll.head: Show current chat poll on your stream
chatPoll.non_premium_limit:
You reached the maximum number of answers.
Become premium to set up to {MAX} answers.

labels.head: Show labels on your stream
labels.premium_limit: You reached the maximum number of labels you can create
labels.non_premium_limit:
You reached the maximum number of labels you can create.
Become premium to create up to {MAX} labels.

animatedText.header:
Show animated text on your stream
Control them from the {TRIGGERS}
animatedText.premium_limit: You reached the maximum number of overlays you can create
animatedText.non_premium_limit:
You reached the maximum number of animated text overlays.
Become premium to set up to {MAX} overlays.

delete_confirm.title: Delete entry
delete_confirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this entry?

customTrain.premium_limit: You reached the maximum number of custom trains you can create
customTrain.non_premium_limit:

Become premium to create up to {MAX} custom trains.
customTrain.state_cooldown_tt:
Train is on cooldown
Click to reset.
customTrain.connectPlatform_tt: This platform has not been connected
customTrain.connectPlatform_twitchCharity_tt: You have not linked any charity campaign with your Twitch account

delete_confirm.title: Delete entry
delete_confirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this entry?

customTrain.param_approachEventCount:
Number of events for the train to approach
(in a 10min timeframe)
customTrain.param_triggerEventCount:
Number of events to start the train
(approaching events will count)
customTrain.param_cooldownDuration_ms: Duration to wait before next train
customTrain.param_postLevelUpOnChat: Send a message on level up
customTrain.param_postLevelUpChatMessage: üöÇ Choo Choo Level {'{'}LEVEL{'}'} reached! {'{'}AMOUNT{'}'} to go for the next level!
customTrain.param_postSuccessOnChat: Send a message when train completes
customTrain.param_postSuccessChatMessage: üöÇ Choo Choo mission complete! Level {'{'}LEVEL{'}'} reached with {'{'}AMOUNT{'}'}!
customTrain.param_platforms: Chose tip platforms accepted for this train
customTrain.allTimeRecord_title: All time record on the {DATE}, level {LEVEL} at {PERCENT} with {AMOUNT}
